comment.author: 49342449@N05
comment._content: On old photos it is possible to study history. Public library on wheels...

comment.author: 14472354@N00
comment._content: Gives a feeling of an innocent time where the truck was essentially the internet of the day  - moving information from location to location along the back road "super highways" of the time.

comment.author: 52394747@N00
comment._content: I remember the bookmobile coming to Blackalls Park where I lived as a child. It was wonderful to have a library on wheels coming on a regular basis. I was an avid reader so was glad for the service.

comment.author: 29273846@N06
comment._content: bhojman- glad you have such great memories of the library. If you want to take a trip down memory lane there are lots of historic photos of Lake Macquarie at Lake Macquarie City Council website

comment.author: 95323162@N00
comment._content: Needs to be added to the Bookmobile Group!

comment.author: 95912590@N00
comment._content: I really like this one, thanks for uploading. love the barefoot little guy waiting for his books. I recently used it as an avatar to represent an anonymous librarian here: hiringlibrarians.wordpress.com/2012/02/29/demonstrate-emo...
